title: David Lammy – 2021 Comments on Prison Safety
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Justice Secretary, on 2 June 2021.
content:
Conservative mismanagement has left our prisons overcrowded and understaffed, making them hotbeds for reoffending.
